Enter your registered mobile number and email below : Submit OTP Restaurant Name Your previous orders are listed below : Rating Cost (low to high) Cost (high to low) A COMPLETE HUB FOR DELICIOUS FOOD Enter your OTP New Password (Min. 6 Characters) Enter the received OTP below Order Confirmed !!!
// Faq's
How long does it take to deliver the food? It depends upon the orders that the restaurant have at that present time and how long does it take for cooking the food, as soon as the food is ready our executive pick ups the food from the restaurant and moves out to deliver it to your location. \nUsually this whole process takes 30 to 45 minutes approximately. What are the different modes of payments provided by you? We accept payments from the following sources : \n1 : Credit and Debit cards \n2 : Paytm /Google Pay /Phone Pe/ UPI \n3 : Cash On Delivery Is there any variation in the price of the food in ordering online? The prices are usually lower or same as that of the actual prices of the restaurants. \nHowever, on ordering online you receive many new vouchers and cashback offers which you can use during the order to get the food at more lower price. How much do you charge to deliver the food at our location? It depends upon the total amount of your cart i.e., if the cart value is greater than Rs.129 then the delivery cost is free, and if your cart value is less than Rs.129 then we will charge Rs.20 for delivering the food at your desired location. Why we are supposed to rate the restaurant and the delivery person? Rating the restaurant and delivery executive is not mandatory, it is up to you whether you want to rate or not. /nHowever rating helps other users to know about the services of the restaurants and delivery executive i.e., What is quality of the food provided by restaurant, How long do restaurants take to cook your food, How long does delivery executive takes to deliver the food, etc. You do not have any favourites restaurants You haven\'t placed any orders yet
